title: The Definitive Her Rewatch, Trained Crow Armies 5.4.20
itunes:title: The Definitive Her Rewatch, Trained Crow Armies 5.4.20
description:
In episode 622, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedian Sofiya Alexandra to discuss the film Her for the TDZ Movie Club.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Spike Jonze, Video Game Character
  2. Spike Jonze, Why Are There No Brown People in Your Future Los Angeles?
  3. How The Her Filmmakers Created A Utopian Los Angeles Of The Not-Too-Distant Future
  4. WATCH: Every Single Word Spoken by a Person of Color in "Her"
  5. 'Her,' In Translation
  6. Q: In “Her,” what’s the significance of the color red?
  7. WATCH: Rhi - Plain Jane

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
